Function.Description: The isCharLowercase function returns true if every character in the argument is a lowercase Character; otherwise false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isCharLowercase function returns true if every character in the argument {obj} is a lowercase character. Otherwise the isCharLowercase function returns false.
Brief.Usage: The isCharLowercase function function is used to query an object to see if it contains only lowercase characters.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector ByteVector Text Boolean

Syntax.Return: If the object contains only lowercase characters, true is returned. Otherwise false is returned.
